Package edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene

##### THIS IS THE TEMPLATE FOR THE PACKAGE DOC COMMENTS.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
INeuronMorphologyView Describes the 3D structure of a biological object in a format that can be easily visualized in a 3D viewer (X3D?)
ISegmentView The visual representation of a segment or segment group.
ISlideView Defines a slide, which is a plane in space that has the image of a slice of brain on it.
IView Defines the view of the entire application.
IView2D Defines all 2D "heads up display" menus, popups, and so forth for the application
IView3D Stands in for the Root Node of the 3D Scene Graph
 

Class Summary
MeshViewImpl Visualizes a mesh.
NeuronMorphologyViewImpl Visualizes a neuron morphology.
SegmentViewImpl Implements ISegmentView.
SlideViewImpl Implements ISlideView
View2DImpl Implements IView2D
View3DImpl Implements IView3D
ViewImpl Implements IVew
VolumeViewImpl Visualizes an IVolume
 

Package edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene Description
